channel.title: CVE Feed for seraphinitesoft -- Seraphinite Accelerator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for seraphinitesoft -- Seraphinite Accelerator

item.title: CVE-2024-1568|2024-02-28T06:46:47.074Z -- seraphinitesoft -- seraphinite%20accelerator
item.description: The Seraphinite Accelerator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.20.52 via the OnAdminApi_HtmlCheck function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application and can be used to query and modify information from internal services.
